nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 15. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 31. West wind around 6 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers between 10pm and 3am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 25, with temperatures rising to around 32 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 17 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain after 7am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 47. Southwest wind 15 to 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.shortForecast: Light Rain Likely then Rain Showers Likely
nws.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 7pm, then rain showers likely between 7pm and 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 34. Southwest wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7am, then a slight chance of snow showers between 7am and 10am, then a slight chance of rain showers between 10am and 1pm, then a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 36. West wind 18 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
